alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler County through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Crescent City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Andalusia and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
